Package edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller

Class LandingPageController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.LandingPageController
@Controller public class LandingPageController extends Object
Controller for Home page and searching. Interacts with the widget database and its inheriting classes.
